metadata.dc:author: López-Cano, Manuel
Serra-Aracil, Xavier
metadata.dc:description: The high incidence of parastomal hernia and the controversy surrounding its repair make its prevention an area of intense research. The aim of this article is to describe the modified Sugarbaker technique with a new mesh for the prevention of parastomal hernia using a laparoscopic approach.
metadata.dc:title: Prevención laparoscópica de la hernia paraestomal mediante técnica de Sugarbaker modificada con malla compuesta (Physiomesh®).
[Parastomal hernia prevention through laparoscopic modified Sugarbaker technique with composite mesh (Physiomesh®)].
